short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will scan content from web profile page also assign job from extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iSmartRecruit Profile Scanner will scan profile from different portal and source that profile into iSmartRecruit.Almost every detail about the candidates can be captured and stored in iSmartRecruit Candidate Management System.
